capricorn

Class Watcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • capricorn.Watcher

  • public class Watcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The watcher is the monitoring service of Capricorn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Watcher(java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> directories)
      The Watcher class can function with any given list of Paths.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start()
      Start the monitoring
      void stop()
      Stop the monitoring

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Watcher

        public Watcher(java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> directories)
        The Watcher class can function with any given list of Paths. In the case that the amount or location of the directories change in the future, the list can be obtained in one location.
        Parameters:
        directories - the directories to be monitored

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the monitoring

        Stop the monitoring
